website_summaries.verdict: A superb option that allows you to instantly create donut holes, cake pops, and other delicious desserts.
pros: Even heat distribution means you won't have to worry about overcooked or undercooked pastries
On/off switch is easy to use
Power-on light tells you precisely when your pastries are ready
cons: Pastries sometimes stick to the donut maker's surface

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ableskiever
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used a cast iron Ableskiever pan for 40+ years as this is what she grew up using in her home. She saw one of these and mentioned how much easier a teflon covered pan would be to clean and how easy it would be to control the temperature. I bought her one for her birthday on Amazon and she loves it! Makes great Ableskiver and even includes a coated probe for turning that works better than the steel kitchen dual prong fork she's always used. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: steve w.

customer_reviews.title: great takoyaki maker
customer_reviews.text: I am a takoyaki lover. This machine help me satisfying my craving without killing my wallet. It is fun to make my own takoyaki too. Very easy to use just turn on the pan and it heat up fairly fast. comes with 8 medium size holds. can make 8 takoyakis at a time. this machine also comes with a metal stick, need it when you roll the takoyaki and pick them out when ready. I can also see this machine being used as cakepop maker. Be creative and it will be a great plus for kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Bad design and cook unevenly. The cord set under the machine and makes it titled. The temperature isn't event and make some cakes in one side cooked faster than another side.
customer_reviews.author: Nha Hoan Le

customer_reviews.title: Takoyaki Pot
customer_reviews.text: Takoyaki is one of the famous foods in Japan, even in Shanghai. I bought Takoyaki in Japanese Dept. Store in Shanghai once, it was very delicious. So I was thinking if I have this pot then I can make and eat any time. This pot is easy to use and easy to clean. Thanks for merchant.
customer_reviews.author: Germaine Tsuei

customer_reviews.title: Was great til it stopped
customer_reviews.text: I used this pretty heavily 2 times. Both times I ran it solidly for a couple hours. And then it just burned out.
customer_reviews.author: tomwilliamz

customer_reviews.title: Worked with it for a while and it should work better
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased with lack of instructions. Didn’t know when to turn the food. I made pancake balls and everyone loved them and also liked the convenience of it being an electric appliance
customer_reviews.author: jackie a. thompson

customer_reviews.title: Want get bigger size but more holes
customer_reviews.text: Love it , i wish they have more holes n the size of this one.
customer_reviews.author: noramy onn

customer_reviews.title: Delivery great, but product does not bake evenly
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is easy to use and delivery and purchase great. It worked perfect the first time I used it, but since then, it does not heat evenly in each circle. Some are too hot and others aren't hot enough. So I just have to make sure not to burn them and to rotate them to different circles. It's a bit more time consuming and irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Kema M.

customer_reviews.title: Takoyaki party
customer_reviews.text: Works great for making takoyaki and heats up nice and evenly. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: speed_star

customer_reviews.title: Love takoyaki but unless I willing to pay a LOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Love takoyaki but unless I willing to pay a LOT for 6 small balls, I don't get it. So happy to be able to make large enough balls that they can't be popped in on one bite :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly..that is if you make these quite often.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to make the family ebelskiver's, was able to make more at once..
customer_reviews.author: suzq

customer_reviews.title: Love my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love making abelskivers. This pan is absolutely the best to make them instead of the cast iron pan,
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Petersen

product_meta.title: Health and Home Electric Japanese Takoyaki Octopus Pan 8- Balls Maker Danish Aebleskiver and Ebelskiver Maker, Cake Pops Maker With Nonstick Coating,Easy Clean
product_meta.description:
Aluminum baking pan with non-stick coating, cooks up to 8 round pastries at a time. Easy to use, clean, and store! 
Evenly heating: This electric pan is evenly heated,no hole will be left cold.It's easy to cook perfect takoyaki. 
Perfect for jelly-filled pastries, lean meatballs, or cake pops. This is the suitable product for you and your whole family to make delicious takoyaki within minutes. When your friends come, you can also share the happiness of delicious food with them.You can even make cake pops with your children and enjoy happy parent-child time. 
All products in our shop have passed the safety certification of the United States. This is a very healthy, safe and convenient product.
Hurry up and act! Make delicious food for your family.
feature_bullets: Electric Ebelskiver Maker - Make the popular Danish Aebleskiver，pancake puffs, donut holes,cake pops and pies in your home! Serve delicious sweet anytime!

Hole diameter:2.2" - It's plenty of room for fruit, jam, cheese, peanut butter, chocolate, egg, batter or meats like sausage, ham or bacon.Top with syrup, jam or powdered sugar. The possibilities are endless!
Aluminum baking tray heats quickly; Nonstick surface.
Power-on light indicator, easy-to-use on/off switch, instructions included.It's safer and easier to use.
2-Year Warranty. Includes a free tool for Aebleskiver.
